description: Whether you need a quick party appetiser or a tasty pre-dinner snack, this Tex Mex-inspired chunky dip-slash-salad lets the veggies do the talking, with creamy avocado, bright tomatoes, black beans, corn, peas and coriander.
name: Cowboy Caviar Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g Woolworths black beans no added salt, rinsed, drained
1 pkt original corn chips, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place beans in a serving bowl. Set aside.

Place frozen vegetables in a heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water. Stand for 2-3 minutes or until tender. Drain. Add beans to pea, corn and capsicum mix. Stir in tomatoes, then half of the avocado and gently fold to combine.
Top with remaining avocado and drizzle with dressing. Sprinkle coriander over the top and serve with corn chips.
